suggestions.reason: Dizziness and exhaustion are common symptoms of anemia, which can be caused by various factors including iron deficiency.  The lack of exercise might contribute to lower energy levels.
Fatigue and dizziness are common symptoms of hypothyroidism.  Further investigation would be needed to rule this out.
While not explicitly stated, dehydration can cause dizziness and exhaustion.  Lack of exercise and unspecified fluid intake make this a possibility.
Given the father's history of heart attack, cardiovascular problems should be considered.  Dizziness can be a symptom of some heart conditions.  This requires further investigation.
Prolonged exhaustion and lack of exercise can be associated with depression.  Further assessment is needed to rule out this possibility.
